document_data.name: City Guard of Gana
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of the [[Gana]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Riches".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 5,000 infantry, 2,000 mercenaries, and a navy of 30 ships. Gana also supported a rookery in the nearby [[Al-Yabki Mountains]] that housed five highly trained [[Zakharan roc]]s and riders. Gana was also accused of hiring privateers to harass and hinder their rival [[Jumlat]].
document_data.Activities: The navy spent much of its time protecting Gana's pearl diving interests in the region.
